name: card_type
description: Type of the credit card (e.g., Credit, Debit).

name: card_expiration_date
description: Expiration date of the credit card in MM/YY format.

name: card_code_security
description: Security code of the credit card.

name: card_flag
description: Flag of the credit card (e.g., Visa, MasterCard).

name: Enabled
description: Indicates if the card is enabled.

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the card was created.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the card was last updated.

name: deleted_at
description: Timestamp when the card was deleted.

name: fk_associate_id
description: Unique identifier for the customer associated with the card.
